divs: Sighting Detailssummer time out side in front yard, direcly over head just hier than the tree line and house. around the object cloud like? center of cloud a sweral of colers? lights? no other cloudes that day at all! i do not know what it was or is? is it man made or not? but did not act like anything i know thats man made! it was there then it was gone? it was around noon or so when i saw it then i dont remember any thing after? the time seemed later after? i never belived in aliens before and still try to be skeptical even now but this i'v never been able to esplain?
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Litchfield
There were no other sightings in Litchfield on or around July 20th 1989
